sentences.en: A story was going round that the factory was in line for closure.
sentences.cn: 关于这家工厂很可能关门的说法在到处流传.

sentences.en: Almost three in four clinics say they face closure by the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 几乎有3/4的诊所说年底前要面临歇业。

sentences.en: I asked McKeown if the reunion was meant to achieve closure.
sentences.cn: 我问麦基翁重聚是不是为了寻求解脱。

sentences.en: Several military bases are threatened with closure .
sentences.cn: 几处军事基地面临关闭。
几所学校面临最终关闭.

sentences.en: The bus had to deviate from its usual route because of a road closure.
sentences.cn: 因为道路封闭，公共汽车只得绕道而行。

sentences.en: The closure of the factory is a retrograde step .
sentences.cn: 工厂的关闭是一大退步。

sentences.en: The closure of the large factory made many workers live in idleness.
sentences.cn: 那家大工厂的关闭使许多工人失业.

sentences.en: The closure of the mine was the single most important factor in the town's decline.
sentences.cn: 矿山的关闭是这个镇衰落的唯一最重要的因素。

sentences.en: The hospital has been threatened with closure.
sentences.cn: 这家医院面临着关闭的威胁。

sentences.en: The pit was one of the 31 earmarked for closure by the Trade and Industry Secretary.
sentences.cn: 这是工贸大臣明确指出要关闭的31个矿井之一。

sentences.en: The reasons for closure are multifarious.
sentences.cn: 关闭是多种原因造成的。

sentences.en: The ring C is called the integral closure of A in B.
The RSC was calling a press conference to announce the theatre's closure.
sentences.cn: 皇家莎士比亚剧团要召开新闻发布会，宣布剧院关闭。

sentences.en: With the closure of the factory, thousands of workers have been thrown on the scrap heap.
sentences.cn: 工厂倒闭, 几千名工人被遗弃.

words.tran_cn: 关；结束；接近（close的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: （永久的）停业，关闭，结束，[电]闭合，[数]闭包
trans.tran_en: when a factory, school, hospital etc has to close permanently
